I think the aliens were using human skin to fuel their spaceship. I don't want my body to be alien fuel. I'm never gonna see my mom again, am I? We're gonna get through this together. All right, buddy? Uh, Sam... I'm sorry for being such a piece of shit to you all this time. You were always there for me, even when our own parents weren't. And I just didn't want you to leave. Hey, Gary. Gary. I'm your sister. I'm not going anywhere. -I love you, okay? -I love you too. Okay. So, what do we do now? I mean, someone must have seen what just happened here. Just stay put and wait for help. -
